channel.description: Recent content in blockchain on Lukas Scheucher

item.title: Solana GIF Dapp
item.description: I created a simple DApp running on Solana via the buildspace.so course. Is a collaborative GIF image board, where users can authenticate via their Solana wallet. The Solana blockchain is used as a database. The app is hosted decentralized on IPFS and ICP.
